content:
/>
XIII.i.3.F.1.f
.
RO Involvement in Verifying Eligibility
If a VA medical facility cannot verify eligibility for medical care under
38 U.S.C. 1720E
based on the information of record, it may send a request for verification of eligibility to the regional office (RO).  The RO must then
review the Veteran’s records to determine whether one or more of the eligibility criteria stated in
M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart i, 3.F.1.d
, have been met
enter
Eligibility to medical treatment under 38 U.S.C. 1720E
[is/is not]
established
in Block 10 (
Remarks
) of Part II of
VA Form 10-7131, Exchange of Beneficiary Information and Request for Administrative and Adjudicative Action
, and
return the form to the VA medical facility.
title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section F - Medical Treatment for Veterans Treated with Nasopharyngeal Radium Irradiation (NRI)
citation: Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section F
